Scenario: Adding a product to the cart # src/test/resources/features/DashBoard.feature:20 Given I am logged in and on the Dashboard page # stepdefs.DashBoardPageStepDef.i_am_logged_in_and_on_the_dashboard_page() Given I enter product name "laptop" in the search box # stepdefs.DashBoardPageStepDef.i_enter_product_name_in_the_search_box(java.lang.String) When I click the search button # stepdefs.DashBoardPageStepDef.i_click_the_search_button() And I click the "Add to cart" button for "14.1-inch Laptop" # stepdefs.DashBoardPageStepDef.i_click_add_to_cart_for_product(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the cart product count should increase # stepdefs.DashBoardPageStepDef.the_cart_product_count_should_increase() And I should see a confirmation message "The product has been added to your shopping cart" # stepdefs.DashBoardPageStepDef.i_should_see_a_confirmation_message(java.lang.String) org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: no such element: Unable to locate element: {"method":"css
